summary.span: 表示 控件中的节点。

span.span: Represents a node in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件由节点构成。The control is made up of nodes. 在树中每个条目都叫做一个节点，并且由对象。Each entry in the tree is called a node and is represented by a object. 包含其他节点的节点称为*父节点*。A node that contains other nodes is called a *parent node*. 包含在另一个节点的节点称为*子节点*。A node that is contained by another node is called a *child node*. 没有子节点的节点称为*叶节点*。A node that has no child nodes is called a *leaf node*. 不包含的任何其他节点，但所有其他节点的上级的节点是*根节点*。A node that is not contained by any other node but is the ancestor to all the other nodes is the *root node*. 父级和子级，但根，父级，可以是节点和叶节点是互相排斥。A node can be both a parent and a child, but root, parent, and leaf nodes are mutually exclusive. 由多个视觉和行为属性节点的节点是否*根*，*父*，或*叶*节点。Several visual and behavioral properties of nodes are determined by whether a node is a *root*, *parent*, or *leaf* node. 虽然典型树具有只有一个根节点，但让您可以将多个根节点添加到树状结构。Although a typical tree has only one root node, the control allows you to add multiple root nodes to your tree structure. 当你想要显示项列表而不会显示一个主要的根节点，如下所示的产品类别列表时，这很有用。This is useful when you want to display item listings without displaying a single main root node, as in a list of product categories. 节点主要在两个属性中存储数据属性和属性。A node primarily stores data in two properties, the property and the property. 值属性显示在控件，并属性用来存储有关该节点，如用于处理回发事件数据的任何其他数据。The value of the property is displayed in the control, and the property is used to store any additional data about the node, such as data used for handling postback events. 节点还存储在其根节点的路径从节点属性。A node also stores the path from the node to its root node in the property. 属性指示相对于根节点的节点的位置。The property indicates the node's position relative to the root node. > [!NOTE] > 同一级别的节点必须每个具有唯一值属性;控件无法区分具有相同的值的不同节点处于同一级别。Nodes at the same level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different nodes at the same level that have the same value. 在此方案中，如果用户单击的节点具有重复值，该节点，会显示中的第一行控件处于选中状态。In this scenario, if the user clicks a node that has a duplicate value, the node that appears first in the control is selected. 一个对象由以下四个用户界面 (UI) 元素，可以自定义或隐藏组成：A object is made up of the following four user interface (UI) elements, which can be customized or hidden: - 展开节点指示符图标来显示该节点是展开、 折叠的还是非可展开。An expansion node indicator icon used to show whether the node is expanded, collapsed, or non-expandable. - 与节点关联可选复选框。An optional check box associated with the node. - 可选节点映像。An optional node image. - 节点的文本。The node text. 可以通过设置指定的可扩展、 可折叠，和非可展开节点指示符的自定义映像， ，并的属性类。You can specify a custom image for the expandable, collapsible, and non-expandable node indicators by setting the , , and properties of the class. 甚至可以通过设置完全隐藏起来展开节点指示符图标的属性类到`false`。The expansion node indicator icons can even be hidden entirely by setting the property of the class to `false`. 若要显示的节点旁边的复选框，将设置属性的类。To display a check box next to a node, set the property of the class. 当属性设置为值`TreeNodeType.Node`，指定的节点类型旁边显示复选框。When the property is set to a value other than `TreeNodeType.Node`, check boxes are displayed next to the specified node type. 您可以通过设置节点的有选择地替代单个节点的复选框属性。You can selectively override the check box of an individual node by setting the node's property. 当显示一个复选框时，使用属性来确定是否已选中复选框。When a check box is displayed, use the property to determine whether the check box is selected. 可以通过设置节点中显示图像属性。You can display an image in a node by setting the property. 节点文本旁边会显示此图像。This image is displayed next to the node text. 中的节点的文本控件可以在两种模式之一中： 选择模式或导航模式。The text of a node in the control can be in one of two modes: selection mode or navigation mode. 默认情况下，一个节点处于选择模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 若要将节点放入导航模式，设置该节点的属性的值不是空字符串 ("")。To put a node into navigation mode, set the node's property to a value other than an empty string (""). 若要使一个节点处于选择模式，设置该节点的属性为空字符串。To put a node into selection mode, set the node's property to an empty string. > [!NOTE] > 某些 Internet 浏览器具有一个限制，即会影响性能的控件。Some Internet browsers have a limitation that can affect the performance of the control. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 有发 2067年字符的 URL 字符限制。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 has a URL character limit of 2067 characters that it posts. 如果某个节点的 URL 中的字符数大于该数字，展开该节点将失败，并且不会引发异常。If the number of characters in a URL of a node is larger than that number, expanding that node will fail and no exception is thrown. 默认情况下，单击某个节点处于选择模式的文章页面回发到服务器并引发事件。By default, clicking a node that is in selection mode posts the page back to the server and raises the event. 您可以选择指定不同的事件，通过设置节点的引发`SelectAction`属性。You can optionally specify a different event to raise by setting the node's `SelectAction` property. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 若要确定在选择模式中被单击的节点，请使用属性的控件。To determine which node was clicked in selection mode, use the property of the control. 在导航模式下一个节点时，该节点禁用所有选择事件。When a node is in navigation mode, all selection events are disabled for that node. 单击导航模式中的节点将用户定向到指定的 URL。Clicking the node in navigation mode directs the user to the specified URL. 可以选择性地设置属性指定的窗口或框架，用于显示链接的内容。You can optionally set the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content. 类包含用于存储节点的状态的多个属性。The class contains several properties that are used to store the state of the node. 使用属性来确定是否选定了一个节点。Use the property to determine whether a node is selected. 若要确定是否已展开节点，请使用属性。To determine whether the node is expanded, use the property. 属性用于确定节点是否绑定到数据。The property is used to determine whether a node is bound to data. 当一个节点绑定到数据时，您可以使用访问基础数据项属性。When a node is bound to data, you can access the underlying data item by using the property. 此类提供多个属性，帮助确定相对于其他节点的节点在树中的位置。The class provides several properties that help to determine the position of a node relative to other nodes in the tree. 使用属性来确定节点的深度。Use the property to determine the depth of the node. 分隔的节点列表从当前节点到其根节点下可以使用属性。You can get the delimited list of nodes from the current node to its root node by using the property. 若要确定该节点的父节点，请使用属性。To determine the node's parent node, use the property. 使用访问子节点集合。Child nodes are accessed using the collection. 有时，它并不可行静态预定义的树结构，由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 正因为如此，控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 可以在运行时扩展时填充一个节点。A node can be populated at run time when it is expanded. 请注意，是否您将保留以异步方式创建的节点，可能出现意外的行为。Note that you can get unexpected behavior if you persist asynchronously created nodes. 例如，如果使用后台辅助线程来以异步方式填充节点，节点树可能不会填充立即但该控件将继续在页生命周期的其余部分。For example, if you use a background worker thread to populate nodes asynchronously, the node tree might not be populated immediately though the control proceeds with the rest of the page life cycle. 在回发时，延迟的创建的节点可能导致问题时已加载控件的视图状态，但未完全填充节点树。On postback, the delayed creation of the nodes can cause problems when the control's view state is loaded but the node tree is not fully populated. 有关动态节点填充的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information on dynamic node population, see the property. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置下一步的代码示例的帧。The following code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the next code example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果节点显示一个复选框，属性通常用于指定是否已选中复选框。When a node displays a check box, the property is commonly used to specify whether the check box is selected. 选中与节点关联的复选框后，会自动将节点添加到的集合控件。When the check box associated with a node is selected, the node is automatically added to the collection of the control. 属性还可以用于确定是否已选中复选框。The property can also be used to determine whether the check box is selected. > [!NOTE] > 它是更常见的是确定在哪些节点控件具有通过遍历所选中其复选框集合。It is more common to determine which nodes in the control have their check boxes selected by iterating through the collection. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定节点的复选框是否被选中。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a node's check box is selected. 它将初始化节点的深度为 1 到所选状态的复选框。It initializes the check boxes of nodes with a depth of one to a selected state. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Newsgroup.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Newsgroup.xml. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取集合，其中包含当前节点的第一级子节点。Use the property to get a collection that contains the first-level child nodes of the current node. 若要循环访问所有的一级子节点，或访问当前节点的特定第一级子节点通常使用此集合。This collection is commonly used to iterate through all the first-level child nodes, or to access a specific first-level child node of the current node. 还可以使用属性以编程方式管理当前节点中的第一级子节点。The property can also be used to programmatically manage the first-level child nodes in the current node. 可以添加、 插入、 删除和检索集合中的对象。You can add, insert, remove, and retrieve objects from the collection. 对集合的任何更新将自动反映在控制的下次刷新页面。Any updates to the collection will automatically be reflected in the control the next time the page is refreshed. 若要访问更深层树子节点，请使用属性要导航节点级别下的下一级子节点。To access child nodes further down the tree, use the property of the next-level child node to navigate down the node levels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性遍历树。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to traverse the tree. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否展开节点。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the node is expanded.

value.span: 如果已展开节点，则为 ；如果尚未展开节点，则为 或 。

span.span: if the node is expanded, if the node is not expanded, or .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定是否已展开节点。Use the property to specify or determine whether the node is expanded. 你可以展开和折叠节点通过调用和方法，分别。You can expand and collapse a node by calling the and methods, respectively. 您还可以展开和折叠节点及其所有子节点，通过调用和方法，分别。You can also expand and collapse a node and all its child nodes by calling the and methods, respectively. 由于属性是三种状态属性，下面的 C# 代码段会导致编译错误：Since the property is a tri-state property, the following C# code snippet causes a compile error: ``` protected void TreeView1_SelectedNodeChanged(object sender, EventArgs e) { if (TreeView1.Nodes[0].Expanded) { // some work here } } ``` 虽然 VB.Net 隐式转换`Boolean`值设为`NullableBoolean`，C# 却没有。While VB.Net implicitly casts the `Boolean` value to a `NullableBoolean`, C# does not. 因此，它是显式检查该属性的状态的最佳做法。Therefore, it is a best practice to explicitly check the state of the property. 例如，下面的代码示例在 Visual Basic 和 C# 中显式地测试的值属性。For example, the following code examples in Visual Basic and C# explicitly test the value of the property. 下面的 Visual Basic 代码示例显式测试的值属性。The following Visual Basic code example explicitly tests the value of the property. 此示例测试是否属性设置为`True`; 因此`Nothing`并`False`贯穿`If`语句。This example tests if the property is set to `True`; therefore `Nothing` and `False` fall through the `If` statement. ``` If TreeView1.Nodes(0).Expanded = True Then 'some work hereEnd IF ``` 此 C# 代码示例显式测试的值属性。This C# code example explicitly tests the value of the property. 此示例测试是否属性设置为`True`; 因此`Null`并`False`贯穿`If`语句。This example tests if the property is set to `True`; therefore `Null` and `False` fall through the `If` statement. ``` if( TreeView1.Nodes[0].Expanded == true ) { //some work here} ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式展开节点。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically expand a node. 它将初始化深度为 1 到已扩展状态的所有节点。It initializes all nodes with a depth of one to an expanded state. 请注意，在展开的根节点后，尚未展开其子节点。Notice that when the root node is expanded, its child nodes are already expanded. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Book.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeExpanded#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeExpanded/CS/treenodeexpandedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeExpanded#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeExpanded/VB/treenodeexpandedvb.aspx#1)] 以下代码是前一示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code is sample XML data for the previous example. ```
```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 节点的文本可以是在两种模式之一中： 选择模式或导航模式。The text of a node can be in one of two modes: selection mode or navigation mode. 默认情况下，一个节点处于选择模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 若要将节点放入导航模式，设置该节点的属性的值不是空字符串。To put a node into navigation mode, set the node's property to a value other than an empty string. 在导航模式下一个节点时，该节点禁用所有选择事件。When a node is in navigation mode, all selection events are disabled for that node. 单击导航模式中的节点将用户链接到指定的 URL。Clicking the node in navigation mode links the user to the specified URL. 可以选择性地设置属性指定的窗口或框架，用于显示链接的内容。You can optionally set the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置下一步的代码示例的帧。The following code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the next code example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，它并不可行静态预定义的树结构，由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 正因为如此，控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 节点时属性设置为`true`，该节点内填充在运行时通过回发事件时该节点已展开。When a node's property is set to `true`, that node is populated at run time through a postback event when the node is expanded. 若要动态填充节点，填充节点的事件处理方法必须为定义事件。To populate a node dynamically, an event-handling method that populates the node must be defined for the event. 支持的浏览器还可以利用客户端的节点填充。Supported browsers can also take advantage of client-side node population. 如果启用，这将允许控件来动态填充客户端上的节点，展开该节点时，这会阻止需要回发到服务器。When enabled, this allows the control to dynamically populate a node on the client when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server. 客户端的节点填充的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on client-side node population, see . 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以指示动态填充节点。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that a node is populated dynamically. span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的节点的文本控件可以在两种模式之一中： 选择模式或导航模式。The text of a node in the control can be in one of two modes: selection mode or navigation mode. 默认情况下，一个节点处于选择模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 若要将节点放入导航模式，设置该节点的属性的值不是空字符串 ("")。To put a node into navigation mode, set the node's property to a value other than an empty string (""). 若要使一个节点处于选择模式，设置该节点的属性为空字符串。To put a node into selection mode, set the node's property to an empty string. > [!NOTE] > 在导航模式下一个节点时，该节点禁用选择事件。When a node is in navigation mode, selection events are disabled for that node. 单击某个节点会将用户定向到指定的 URL，而不是将页面回发到服务器的发布和引发事件。Clicking a node will direct the user to the specified URL, rather than posting the page back to the server and raising an event. 在选择模式下一个节点时，请使用属性来指定在选定节点时引发的事件。When a node is in selection mode, use the property to specify which event or events are raised when a node is selected. 下表列出了可用的选项。The following table lists the available options. |选择操作Selection action|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand`|切换节点的展开和折叠状态。Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed. 将引发事件或作为相应事件。Raises the event or the event as appropriate.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`|在选定节点时不引发任何事件。Raises no events when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Select`|在选定节点时引发 事件。Raises the event when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`|同时将引发和时选择节点的事件。Raises both the and the events when a node is selected. 仅展开节点，永远不会折叠。Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 属性不呈现的节点及其属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。The property is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定单击节点时引发的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which event is raised when a node is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/CS/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/VB/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientvb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 如果显示复选框，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to display the check box; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 控件可以显示节点的映像旁边的复选框。The control allows you to display a check box next to a node's image. 使用属性来显示或隐藏当前节点的复选框。Use the property to show or hide the check box for the current node. 尽管属性可以用于显示的复选框，它是更常见的是使用属性的控件。Although the property can be used to display check boxes, it is more common to use the property of the control. 属性，但是，会影响每个节点类型指定的属性; 因此，属性通常用于重写该设置的单个节点。The property, however, affects every node type specified by the property; therefore, the property is often used to override that setting for an individual node. 由于属性是三种状态属性，下面的 C# 代码段会导致编译错误：Since the property is a tri-state property, the following C# code snippet causes a compile error: ``` protected void TreeView1_SelectedNodeChanged(object sender, EventArgs e) { if (TreeView1.Nodes[0].Expanded) { // some work here } } ``` 虽然 VB.Net 隐式转换`Boolean`值设为`NullableBoolean`，C# 却没有。While VB.Net implicitly casts the `Boolean` value to a `NullableBoolean`, C# does not. 因此，它是显式检查该属性的状态的最佳做法。Therefore, it is a best practice to explicitly check the state of the property. 例如，下面的代码示例在 Visual Basic 和 C# 中显式地测试的值属性。For example, the following code examples in Visual Basic and C# explicitly test the value of the property. 下面的 Visual Basic 代码示例显式测试的值属性。The following Visual Basic code example explicitly tests the value of the property. 此示例测试是否属性设置为`True`; 因此`Nothing`并`False`贯穿`If`语句。This example tests if the property is set to `True`; therefore `Nothing` and `False` fall through the `If` statement. ``` If TreeView1.Nodes(0).Expanded = True Then 'some work hereEnd IF ``` 此 C# 代码示例显式测试的值属性。This C# code example explicitly tests the value of the property. 此示例测试是否属性设置为`True`; 因此`Null`并`False`贯穿`If`语句。This example tests if the property is set to `True`; therefore `Null` and `False` fall through the `If` statement. ``` if( TreeView1.Nodes[0].Expanded == true ) { //some work here} ``` 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式显示和隐藏中的节点的复选框控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically show and hide the check box for a node in the control. 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Book.xml 的文件。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeShowCheckBox#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeShowCheckBox/CS/treenodeshowcheckboxcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeShowCheckBox#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeShowCheckBox/VB/treenodeshowcheckboxvb.aspx#1)] 以下代码是前一示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code is sample XML data for the previous example. ```
```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时单击该节点属性指定的窗口或框架，用于显示 Web 内容链接到的节点。Use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a node when that node is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性将替代属性的控件。Setting this property overrides the property of the control. > [!NOTE] > 属性将呈现为`target`属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`特性，可以在`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许元素。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未设置属性如果呈现的输出对象必须是 XHTML 1.1 符合。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the object must be XHTML 1.1-compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在创建可访问网页时，强烈建议您不要使用属性将另一个窗口作为目标。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET 可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置下一个示例中的帧。The following code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the next example. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/CS/framecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/VB/framevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要在其中显示链接的内容帧。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the frame in which to display the linked content. 此示例在前一示例的框架集用于显示内容的表。This example is used within the frameset of the previous example to display a table of contents. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定为中的节点显示的文本控件。Use the property to specify or determine the text that is displayed for the node in the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性包含`null`，则`get`访问器返回的值属性。If the property contains `null`, the `get` accessor returns the value of the property. 如果属性，又包含`null`，返回。If the property, in turn, contains `null`, is returned. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的节点的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text for a node. summary.span: 获取或设置用于存储有关节点的任何其他数据（如用于处理回发事件的数据）的非显示值。

span.span: Gets or sets a non-displayed value used to store any additional data about the node, such as data used for handling postback events.

value.span: 与节点有关并且不会显示的补充数据。

span.span: Supplemental data about the node that is not displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于补充通过将存储与节点关联的任何其他数据的属性。The property is used to supplement the property by storing any additional data associated with the node. 此值不会显示在控件和通常用于存储用于处理回发事件数据。This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性包含`null`，则`get`访问器返回的值属性。If the property contains `null`, the `get` accessor returns the value of the property. 如果属性，又包含`null`，返回。If the property, in turn, contains `null`, is returned. > [!NOTE] > 同一级别的节点必须每个具有唯一值属性;控件无法区分具有相同的值的不同节点处于同一级别。Nodes at the same level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different nodes at the same level that have the same value. 在此方案中，如果用户单击的节点具有重复值，该节点，会显示中的第一行控件处于选中状态。In this scenario, if the user clicks a node that has a duplicate value, the node that appears first in the control is selected. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来存储密钥字段。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to store the key field. summary.span: 获取从根节点到当前节点的路径。

span.span: Gets the path from the root node to the current node.

value.span: 由分隔符分隔的节点值列表，这些值构成从根节点到当前节点的路径。

span.span: A delimiter-separated list of node values that form a path from the root node to the current node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含的节点值，它构成从根节点到当前节点的路径分隔符分隔的列表。The property contains a delimiter-separated list of node values that form a path from the root node to the current node. 使用属性来指定用于分隔节点值的分隔符字符。Use the property to specify the delimiter character used to separate the node values. 此值通常用于分析的列表，各个值，也可作为参数传递方法的类。This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values, or to pass as an argument to the method of the class. 中显示的值根据控件中，分隔符字符可能需要更改，以防止任何冲突。Depending on the value displayed in the control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts. 例如，如果将为逗号分隔符字符，显示的值不能包含任何逗号;否则，不能准确地分析属性。For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed value should not contain any commas; otherwise, you cannot accurately parse the property. > [!NOTE] > 同一级别的节点必须每个具有唯一值属性;控件无法区分具有相同的值的不同节点处于同一级别。Nodes at the same level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different nodes at the same level that have the same value. 在此方案中，如果用户单击的节点具有重复值，该节点，会显示中的第一行控件处于选中状态。In this scenario, if the user clicks a node that has a duplicate value, the node that appears first in the control is selected. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何分析属性。The following code example demonstrates how to parse the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPathSeparator2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPathSeparator2/CS/treeviewpathseparatorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPathSeparator2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPathSeparator2/VB/treeviewpathseparatorvb.aspx#1)]
